import React,{ useContext } from "react"; import IngredienstList from "./IngredientsList"; import { RecipeContext } from "./App"; export default function Recipe(props){ const {handleRecipeDelete,handleRecipeSelect,handleRecipeChange} = useContext( RecipeContext ); const {id,name,cookTime,servings,instructions,ingredients}=props; return (

{name}

Cook Time: {cookTime}
Servings: {servings}
Instructions:
{instructions}
Ingredients:
); }
